items.title: To DO List App
items.description: Created basic app in the Road to Hire Program, and it helps with organizing daily tasks

items.title: Friends List App
items.description: Designed and developed cards that will give you a list of friends that you can decided to delete whenever you want

items.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
items.description: Fun tic tac toe game with dynamic color changing functionality. You can play this with your friends and family

items.title: Speech Recognition Guessing Game
items.description: Modern  guessing game with speech recognition feature

items.title: Ecommerce Website
items.description: React Based website focused on selling dolphin products

items.title: Animated Navbar
items.description: Navbar specifically designed and developed for animation websites as well as for responsive apps

items.title: Hotel App
items.description: Very informative and organized hotel app with pictures and a variety of icon designs.

items.title: GitHub User Locator
items.description: Used GitHub API to create an app that will help you locate users based on the database information that I have included in my code.

items.title: Gateway Website
items.description: The very first application that I created when I started the Road to Hire Code Academy. It includes information about the country, Honduras

items.title: Counter App
items.description: Fun and counter app, with reset button that helps you start counting over again.

items.title: Pokemon Inquirer
items.description: This is a very interesting node application, where you are able to train a pokemon of your choice. If you would like to see it in action, clone my GitHub Repo and run it in Terminal.

items.title: Weather App
items.description: Used a third party API to create this innovative app where you are able to get the current weather of a city of your choice
